description:
Pekoms creates a diversion for Brook to set his plan into action. Meanwhile Luffy continues to goad Big Mom into a fight, and Pudding begins to have stirrings of rebellion herself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fateful Confrontation! Luffy and Big Mom!
Eine schicksalhafte Herausforderung! – Ruffy und Big Mom!
Innnen no Taimen: Luffy to Big Mom!
Lo scontro del destino. Luffy e Big Mom!
Une confrontation décisive. Luffy et Big Mom !
¡Una confrontación fatídica! Luffy y Big Mom
Судьбоносная встреча! Луффи и Большая Мамочка!
因縁の対面 ルフィとビッグ・マム!
